mapper.sql: id, rank_name, type, child_type, remarks, creation_date, update_date
mapper.insert: insert into evaluate_rank (rank_name, type, child_type, remarks, creation_date, update_date) values (#{rankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{childType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update:
update evaluate_rank
rank_name = #{rankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
child_type = #{childType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creation_date = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update evaluate_rank set rank_name = #{rankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, child_type = #{childType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creation_date = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from evaluate_rank where type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by id
